segments.text: My attention shifts now to the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are two children involved in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks really unstable, almost like it's about to tip over backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, and I can see a "COOKIE JAR" inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is in the jar, probably grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her hand up, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's impressive how they're working together, a tiny conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool really worries me; it could give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine if he fell into that puddle of water!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely unaware of this daring cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their expressions are so intent on their forbidden treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to be in big trouble if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, to be so bold and unaware of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
